mapper.select: { call MANT_SOLICITUDES_TRAMITE ( #{operacion, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{operacionParam, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{objeto.idSolicitudTramite, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{objeto.asunto, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{objeto.fechaHoraRegistro, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{objeto.estado, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{objeto.tipoTramite, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{objeto.descripcion, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{userAudit, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{resultados, jdbcType = CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, mode = OUT, resultMap=SolicitudTramiteResultMap} ) }
